Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_stream_playback_rate

The function AIL_stream_playback_rate returns the current stream playback rate.

S32 AIL_stream_playback_rate(
  HSTREAM stream
);

In Parameters

stream
indicates the stream handle whose playback rate is to be returned.

Returns

The stream's playback rate in samples per second (hertz).

Discussion

See AIL_set_stream_playback_rate for more information.


Group: Digital Audio Streaming Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_stream_playback_rate
Related Basic Types: HSTREAM, S32
